sn56.52:4.1: * “Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, pokkharaṇī paññāsayojanāni āyāmena, paññāsayojanāni vitthārena, paññāsayojanāni ubbedhena, puṇṇā udakassa samatittikā kākapeyyā.
sn56.52:4.3: Taṃ kiṃ maññatha, bhikkhave, katamaṃ nu kho bahutaraṃ—
sn56.52:4.4: yaṃ vā kusaggena ubbhataṃ, yaṃ vā pokkharaṇiyā udakan”ti?
sn56.52:4.8: Saṅkhampi na upeti, upanidhampi na upeti, kalabhāgampi na upeti pokkharaṇiyā udakaṃ upanidhāya kusaggena udakaṃ ubbhatan”ti.
